description: NON TOUCH ViewSonic's VA705-LED features an LED backlit 17" 4:3 panel with 1280x1024 native resolution, 10M:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio, and an environmentally friendly mercury-free panel. The VESA mountable matte finish design also includes Energy Star certification with just 20W power consumption in Normal Mode, or 12W in ECO Mode. The elegant slim bezel, full 3 year warranty, and the industry's best pixel policy make the VA705-LED the perfect small form factor display solution for your basic application and computing needs.
